name: WorldWideID
overview:
WWID i.e. WorldWideID is a new social networking site which provides its users an oppurtinity to connect with anyone in anyway they like. In WWID people can create and socialize via multiple identities (WWIDs) which can focus on different areas like their professions, interests or social circles.

You can get a WorldWideID account and

  • Create permanent and temporary WWIDs including Anonymous.
  • Have @wwid.net email address and http://wwid.net/(yourwwid) homepage for each WWID.
  • Use WWID email filtering and forwarding to protect your other email addresses against unwanted emails.
  • Share your thoughts, works and things you like in WWID boards and catalogs using any WWID you want.
  • Manage all your WWIDs via single sign on.

WWID is still in private beta phase.
